medical_history.chief_complaint: Respiratory distress in a 5-day-old male infant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The respiratory distress was witnessed shortly after birth and persisted post-extubation, remaining during antibiotic therapy. The condition was noted immediately upon transfer to the neonatal ICU.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The mother used valproic acid for epilepsy treatment before and during pregnancy. The mother's first-born child had autism.
medical_history.family_history: The first-born child of the mother had autism. No consanguinity reported between the parents.
